message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite a bit higher.  Could you do $170?
I'm still interested in the product, but $170 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
